  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_494</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_494</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Funciones trigonométricas e inversas</string>
            <string language="en">Trigonometric functions and inverse functions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrische Funktionen und umgekehrte 
Funktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctions trigonométriques et fonctions 
inverses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funções trigonometric e funções inversas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzioni trigonometriche e funzioni inverse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Trigonometric λειτουργίες και αντίστροφες 
λειτουργίες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las funciones trigonométricas inversas. Se muestra su definición a partir del concepto de función inversa y se estudian sus propiedades gráficas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of inverse trigonometric functions. They are defined using the concept of inverse function and their graphical properties are studied.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">trigonometría</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">inversas</string>
            <string language="en">inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">arcotangente</string>
            <string language="en">arctangent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">arcocoseno</string>
            <string language="en">arccosine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">arcoseno</string>
            <string language="en">arcsine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der umgekehrten trigonometrischen Funktionen
zu erklären. Sie werden mit dem Konzept der umgekehrten 
Funktion definiert und ihre graphischen Eigenschaften werden studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept des fonctions trigonométriques 
inverses. Elles sont définies en utilisant le concept de la 
fonction inverse et leurs propriétés graphiques sont étudiées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito de funções trigonometric inversas. São definidos 
usando o conceito da função inversa e suas propriedades gráficas 
são estudadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto delle funzioni trigonometriche inverse. 
Sono definite usando il concetto della funzione inversa e le 
loro proprietà grafiche sono studiate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια των αντίστροφων trigonometric 
λειτουργιών. Καθορίζονται χρησιμοποιώντας την έννοια της 
αντίστροφης λειτουργίας και οι γραφικές ιδιότητές τους 
μελετώνται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">umgekehrt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arkustangens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
